post.body: @ilinap My parenting style in one word: Mentor.
Dell SAYS it shipped this morning. But I'm not holding my breath. I'm beginning to see why HP is kicking Dell's ...
I seriously waited 50 days for my Dell Studio and 80 (so far) for the Mini 9. After coughing up serious bucks. AM SO PISSED.
Do you love it? My mini 9 has somehow been on order since August. I am SO HACKED at Dell for screwing up the order (3 times!)
I LOVE WebEx for meetings of 6 or less.
That sucks! Hope you feel SO much better soon!
Thanks for the tweet! I loved telling Widget that story, and am glad you liked it too.
True, true. Wanting to hear how voter turnout "back home" was though. Did new voters appear this year? Who were they?
Mhum? That state's pretty red tonight too...and has been, since Reconstruction. (Er, there's a phrase I haven't used in million yrs)
Treat yourself, then. Beautiful book, beautiful message. I'm in love....
Also, for older preschoolers and up -- Miss Rumphius is not to be missed.
Matthew Van Fleet's "Dogs" and "Tails." Absolutely!
Step away from the keyboard. I will if you will. No, really! Really! I mean every word I sa
@lunarkatz @stimey I give in. To sleep. At least until the baby (toddler!) wakes up at 3. Wishing you all a restful night too.
Happy Thanksgiving! Am going to sleep now ... going for a RUN in the morning!
Over the moon. Submitted NASA proposal AND accepted invitation to speak at cancer event. Could the day GET any better?
Glowing. I walked 5k today. For reals.
You know you're in remission when... you get a "It's time to see the doctor for your checkup!" card and huz asks, "Dentist time already?"
Farewell, @marsphoenix. We'll miss you!
Best use for a hologram: showing up to work without having to commute.
Virginia is crazy close. Hey, has anyone seen one of those population projection maps today? You know, the one where the northeast is huge?
Georgia for John McCain too. Geez, I used to live in a lot of Republican places.
Trying not to snort at mentions of St. Louis County as a bellweather. I lived there when the county voted for A DEAD GUY. Hah.
This is the most tense 50 seconds EVER.
Whoa! How were all these states called during Bob the Builder? Ah, the life of a mom trying to get preschoolers to bed....
Does anyone out there use telephone transcription services? Would love a recommendation... for professional interviews.
Waiting for th world's slowest drywall guy to finish up. And yes, I am paying him by the hour. (Never again.)
I heart book club.
Looking for permission to quit work and turn off the computer. Ah, the life of a work-at-home stay-at-home never-sleep mom.
Getting excited about running again in the New Year. Anyone else starting to walk or run?
